item.title: Origin and recipe
item.description: Instead to make another Hello world page or enumerating the reasons of writting a new blog, this is a writeup of how this site was build. Is a good way to make the first page useful and serve as work a memory. Maybe i can help me or someone in the future. Choosing CMS Learn something new Easy to maintain Portable Simple Technology involved This site is based of using static plain text files written in Markdown.
